synopsis.text:
Finding herself in a quaint seaside town after a move from bustling Tokyo, 15-year-old Futaba Ooki is mesmerized by the boundless ocean that stretches before her eyes. As she marvels at the endless blue, local diving enthusiast Hikari Kohinata notices her quiet admiration. On their first day of high school, Hikari, an effervescent and friendly girl, is instantly drawn to Futaba's reserved nature and christens her with the affectionate nickname "Teko."

As Hikari introduces Futaba to the thrilling world of scuba diving, the two form a tender friendship that encourages Futaba to break free from her shell. Together, they join their school's diving club, guided by their homeroom teacher Mato Katori. With Hikari's infectious enthusiasm and support, Futaba embarks on a journey to earn her diving certification, forge new friendships, and embrace the exciting possibilities that life has to offer. This heartwarming tale of growth and self-discovery unfolds as Futaba learns to navigate the challenges of adolescence and dive headfirst into the ocean of life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
